choice.span: B. A group that provides DHIS2 implementation support
C. A group that provides standards and requirements for DHIS2
D. The group responsible for the development of the DHIS2 software

div.p: HISP can be described as a global movement that provides DHIS2 implementation support, including standards and requirements for DHIS2. The University of Oslo (UiO) is responsible for the development of the DHIS2 software.
